data.description: eLEARN LMS app is a mobile application for staff from the National Healthcare Group, JurongHealth and Alexandra Health System. It complements the main learning portal - elearn.sg by providing staff with easy access to learning resources and online participation.
data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes and performance improvements

data.description:
The SingHealth eLearning app empowers learning on-the-go. Through the app, users stay connected to the eLearning portal and have easy access to course content or learning activities anytime, anywhere. 

The app is easy to use and provides accessibility to learning resources at the fingertips!
data.releaseNotes: Minor bug fix and enhancement.

data.description: Businesses can now use this customized merchant app to accept payments from their customers using ActiveWallet in the ActiveSG app. Customers will make payment by scanning QR codes and other online mechanisms. Through this app, Business partners can be notified of the payments in real-time, view past transactions and other operations.
data.releaseNotes: Security enhancements

data.description:
Download this free mobile app and start exploring sports and activity venues located throughout Singapore. Designed for smartphone users to make searches, reservations, registrations, purchases and quick payments, all in one convenient, feature-rich app. Real-time access to all facilities and programmes made available to the public by Sport Singapore. 


Key features:


Steps tracker
Now the apps integrates with Apple HealthKit to keep track of the steps you have conquered for each challenge/campaign organized.


All user types
Registered users. Verified members. Supplementary (family) accounts. Junior (under-16) members.  All can use ActiveSG with varying privileges. 


Smart search 
Search for a sports facility nearby, view its location and check its amenities. Ask the app to recommend best possible venues for your interests..


End-to-end booking
Venue, date and time selection. Course registrations. Event sign-ups. Shopping cart with options for add-on items. Payments, cancellations and refunds.
 

One-touch booking
The app remembers all your previous bookings so you can grab your favourite slots the next time round. No need to retrace your steps.


Virtual ID
Check in and check out of a swim or gym facility, by scanning the QR code on your mobile phone screen (after buying an entry pass).
data.releaseNotes: Minor enhancements and bug fixes

data.description:
[About this app]
FlyItSafe is a free-to-download mobile app designed to provide real-time awareness for Unmanned Aircraft (UA) operations in Singapore. When authenticated by UA operators with Operator Permits issued by the Civil Aviation Authority of Singapore (CAAS), FlyItSafe enables you to observe your UA flight with real-time tracking of its operating location. You can be alerted when you are flying out of your designated area of operation, or if a particular UA is operating within close proximity.  

 
[Key features]
- Get live flight information of your UA operation when paired with a CAAS tracker
- Provides visibility of nearby UA operations
- Notification alerts for emergency operations during flight
 

[Push notifications]
Alerts on flight status changes
 

[Recommended Device Requirements]
The app is optimized for iOS 13 - 15.


[Terms of Use & Privacy Statement]
By using the app, these will automatically apply to you, thus please read them carefully before using the app.

 
[Feedback]
We value your feedback! For feedback and enquiries, please contact us at caas_cfms_helpdesk@caas.gov.sg.
data.releaseNotes: App Enhancements

data.description: This app is designed to view and verify personnel licences issued by Civil Aviation Authority of Singapore (CAAS). This app allows licence holders to scan a QR code issued by CAAS via email to add and store their licences within this app. The app also allows a time limited QR code to be generated for enforcement officers to verify the licence authenticity.
data.releaseNotes: DNS bug fixes.

data.description:
“SkillsFuture@PublicService”
 
This application is a service of the Government of Singapore.
 
LEARN is a one-stop digital learning platform that lets you learn wherever you go. It also gives you all that you need to upskill and reskill in a digital workplace.
 
Discover a world of learning resources with CSC’s proprietary content and curated learning pathways from renowned third-party content providers.
 
Sharpen your skills with personalised content according to Public Service Competency Frameworks and your learning needs.
 
Activate your account and LEARN today!
 
Note:
LEARN is best viewed on iOS version 12 and above.
 
If you are downloading the app for the first time or a new Singapore public officer, please check with your HR/Training team on how to obtain a LEARN account.
 
For feedback or technical support, please contact cscollege@cscollege.gov.sg
data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using LEARN! We’ve enhanced the performance of the app for a more enjoyable LEARNing experience.

Others
• UI improvements and bug fixes.

data.description:
This application is brought to you by the Central Provident Fund Board, a Singapore Government Agency.

CPF Mobile provides you with easy access to your personal CPF information on the go. It also provides you with quick access to your CPF statements and services to manage your CPF. You can access the following CPF information and services using your Singpass:
 
•Dashboard 
•Healthcare
•Housing 
•Investment 
•Statements
•Services
•Messages 

For the full suite of CPF online services, please visit cpf.gov.sg.
data.releaseNotes: This update comes with minor app fixes to give you a better experience (:

data.description:
CPF EZPay Mobile is a free tool provided by the CPF Board for employers to conveniently submit their monthly CPF contributions on-the-go. It is optimised for mobile devices to help employers complete their submissions easily and quickly. It is most suitable for employers with 10 or fewer employees.

Benefits of using CPF EZPay Mobile

a) There’s no need to register or log in. Simply download the app to begin.
b) You can load the latest CPF submission details that were transacted on the app with the same mobile device.
c) Mobile optimised screen for positive user experience.
d) Secure payment via PayNow and eNETS (personal bank accounts).

This application is a service of the Singapore Government.
data.releaseNotes: Minor bug fixes.

data.description:
3 fast-paced games await – only the fastest and best will dominate the leaderboard. Are you game enough to take on the challenge? 

Learn how CPF savings can help you to afford life’s key needs, and be rewarded with a customisable cup that’s uniquely yours.* 

*Redeem via the CPF Game On! redemption machines at key community touchpoints. See details at cpf.gov.sg/cpf-game-on.
data.releaseNotes: update security

data.description:
CPF Volunteering (CPFV) is a one-stop platform for CPF members to pay it forward by helping fellow Singaporeans understand CPF schemes and services. This Community Paying it Forward movement encourages more individuals to share their CPF knowledge with their families and social circles, and involves them in the development and delivery of member-centric policies and services. It is run by the Central Provident Fund Board, a statutory board of the Singapore Government.

Features:
+ Access online resources to learn and share with others
+ Track your volunteering journey
+ Unlock achievements and earn experience points
… and more!
data.releaseNotes:
- Minor bug fixes
- Minor user interface enhancements

data.description:
Ever dreamt of putting together your very own home? Now here’s the chance!

Plant some savings for the future, resist Property King’s hard-sell approach, and save a photo of your home to share with your friends.

Along the way, you’ll learn how CPF savings can help you to afford life’s key needs and pick up some tips on how to manage your money.
data.releaseNotes: Added security for App Transport Security

data.description:
TraceTogether supports Singapore’s efforts to fight the spread of COVID-19 through community-driven contact tracing.

TraceTogether notifies you quickly if you’ve been exposed to COVID-19 through close contact with other TraceTogether users. The app allows the Ministry of Health (MOH) to give you timely care and guidance, protecting you and those around you.

The app uses Bluetooth, and your Bluetooth data is stored securely on your phone. It’ll be shared with MOH if you test positive for COVID-19, for the purpose of contact tracing. Also, all Bluetooth data stored on your phone is automatically deleted after 25 days.

TraceTogether helps us ensure that we don’t spread the virus to our loved ones unknowingly. It also helps us support the work of contact tracers and healthcare workers by combating the spread of COVID-19 together.

App functionality will cease once the outbreak ends.

TraceTogether is designed for use by people in Singapore. To register, you will need a valid NRIC, FIN, or a valid document of your current stay in Singapore.
data.releaseNotes:
- We’ve added a section to help you access COVID-related information more easily.
- If you are vaccinated, you can now “view pass” from the home page to quickly show your vaccination and Pre-Event Test status without needing to do SafeEntry check-ins!

data.description:
Log in within seconds using your fingerprint, face or 6-digit passcode!

***

TRANSFORM THE WAY YOU TRANSACT

 • View your information from government sources in one place

With the improved Singpass Myinfo Profile, you can customise the information you want to view on the app. Choose from your CPF account information, HDB property details, passport expiry date, and more.

• Say goodbye to long passwords

With QR login, you can skip entering your Singpass ID and password. Just scan or tap the QR code to launch the app, verify your identity, and you’re in! You can also visit popular digital services directly from the app through the Login Shortcuts.

• Transact securely on the go

Working or staying overseas? Enjoy greater mobility when you use the Singpass app. You no longer need to wait for an SMS OTP to access digital services.

***

KEY APP FEATURES

DIGITAL SIGNING: Sign documents and contracts easily and securely with your Singpass app, removing the need for physical presence and paper-based signing.

INBOX: Receive government notifications through the Singpass app inbox.

VERIFY: Verify your identity in-person securely, with QR scanning.

***

SET UP IN 3 EASY STEPS

All you need is a smartphone, internet connection, and a registered Singpass account.

• Step 1: Install the Singpass app.

• Step 2: Complete a one-time set up.

• Step 3: Your trusted digital identity is now ready for use! You can access digital services via the Singpass app using your fingerprint, face or 6-digit passcode – it’s that simple!

***

FEEDBACK

We want to hear from you! For feedback or questions, please email us at support@singpass.gov.sg.

Note: The Singpass app can only be installed on one device at a time.

This application is brought to you by the Government Technology Agency.

***

RECOMMENDED REQUIREMENTS

For an optimised user experience, do keep your device updated minimally with iOS version 12.0 and above.

***

COMMON ISSUES

Directed to app.singpass.gov.sg when tapping on the QR code during login?

This is due to a delay by iOS at times in retrieving the required configuration file (Apple-App-Site-Association, or AASA in short), which is necessary for QR code tapping (Universal Links) to work.

Here are some workarounds that worked well with other users experiencing the same issue:
• Try again later. Most users reported that iOS managed to retrieve the necessary configuration after some time.
• Restart the phone once (or twice), and wait for a couple minutes for iOS to initialise the Universal Links for the Singpass app (as well as all your other affected apps).
• Uninstall the Singpass app from your device, then download the app again from the official App Store.
data.releaseNotes:
v14.2.1
- Fixed an intermittent crash that may occur when the new customizable shortcuts are rendered

v14.2
- You can now customize which shortcuts to display on the app's home page (up to 6): Tap on "Edit Favourites" to start
- Singpass Foreign user Accounts (SFA) now able to link their corporate accounts: Tap on "Link corporate accounts" under app settings to start
- Renamed "GovWallet Info" category to "NS Benefits" to more accurately reflect the actual benefits
- Updated the search function used throughout the app for a more consistent experience

data.description:
An easy way for citizens to access government services in one, convenient app.

LifeSG (previously Moments of Life) gives you simpler access to government digital services and allows you to handle tasks with ease. 

More than 70 government services and information have been personalised and consolidated into just one app. Check off your to-do list, manage your applications, keep track of the latest government schemes and benefits. 

Use LifeSG to:
• apply for birth registration and baby bonus online
• search for preschools and indicate interest for your child
• explore relevant events, programmes and government services
• view your personal information, appointments and tasks easily
• stay updated with the latest government schemes, benefits and updates

With LifeSG, you can access government services easily and get things done even when you’re on the go. Download LifeSG and give it a try.

Having trouble? Please contact us at helpdesk@life.gov.sg. 

This app is optimised for iOS 10.0 and above.
data.releaseNotes: Some bugs are minor, but minor bugs still annoy us. That’s why this update contains minor bug fixes. Goodbye annoying bugs, hello better app experience!

data.description:
Calculate parking fees automatically
Key in your vehicle number, select the car park and indicate your estimated parking duration. Your charges will be automatically calculated (free parking timings, whole-day parking, night parking are all included).

Pay for parking  digitally
Pay using your credit or debit card and start parking.

Track and extend your parking session remotely
Receive notifications when your parking session is expiring or has ended. Extend your parking session without having to return to your vehicle.

End your parking session early
End your parking session if you're back at your vehicle early. A refund based on the actual parked duration will be given.
data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes

data.description:
Scammers often initiate contact with potential scam victims through phone calls or Short Message Services (SMSes). 

ScamShield actively works in the background to filter scam messages and calls from numbers used in illegal activities, preventing scammers from contacting you.
data.releaseNotes: iOS 15 compatibility improvements

data.description:
*This app is Intended for Businesses Residing in Singapore

SafeEntry helps your business check in visitors with just a scan. Shorten queues and forget the hassle of recording visitor details manually. Support contact tracing by using SafeEntry to log visitors to your business. Join the fight against COVID-19 in Singapore. Download and register for SafeEntry now.
For help, feel free to email appstore@safeentry.gov.sg with your queries!

data.description:
Workpal - your digital buddy at work is here!

Use Workpal to improve your day-to-day work experiences, and enjoy easier and faster way to complete your work transactions. 

Fulfil meetings needs anytime anywhere:
• Book meeting rooms

Easier and faster employee self-service transactions:
• Submit transport claims

and many more!

Enable seamless procurement experience:
• Setup corporate billing for purchase on e-commerce malls
• Approve e-commerce orders from your staffUse Workpal to improve your day-to-day work experiences, and enjoy easier and faster way to complete your HR/Finance/Corporate work transactions.

RedeemSG allows merchants and their staff to easily accept digital vouchers issued by Singapore Government agencies and charities. 

This app is only for merchant staff. To be able to use the app, you will need to be issued with a unique shop code that you will key in after logging in.

SupplyAlly is designed to help businesses and organisations keep a central record of transactions across the many national distribution initiatives.

It is not available for public use.

Happy National Day Singapore!

data.description:
Healthy 365 is a mobile application by the Health Promotion Board (HPB) Singapore which aims to encourage users to adopt a healthier lifestyle. Through the use of gamification and rewards, users are encouraged to sign up for in-app challenges and health programmes to earn Healthpoints. The app seamlessly pairs with fitness tracking devices to help users log their daily steps count and amount of time spent on active exercises. Users can also scan QR codes via the app to earn Healthpoints when they purchase healthier meals, drinks and groceries from participating partners.

 

Key Features:

- Fitness journey at a glance featuring user's fitness and rewards information

- Health challenges, including the National Steps Challenge and Eat, Drink, Shop Healthy Challenge, for users to sign up to convert their healthier actions into rewards

- Events listing featuring exercise classes that users can book via the app

- Healthpoints redemption that includes a catalogue of healthy lifestyle rewards for users to choose from

 

Minimum Mobile Phone OS Requirements:

- iOS Ver. 10

 

Supported HPB-Issued Fitness Trackers:

- AxtroFit 

- AxtroFit 2

- Careeach HR

- Glide HR

- Tempo 2 HR

- Tempo 3C HR

 

Supported 3rd Party Fitness Apps:

- Actxa®

- Apple Health

- Fitbit

- Garmin Connect ™

- Polar Flow

- Samsung Health
data.releaseNotes: - Minor Bugs and Performance Fixes

data.description:
Unlock personalised health & wellness challenges and be rewarded through everyday healthy actions – workouts, mindfulness, healthy eating and more – using LumiHealth app and your Apple Watch.

LumiHealth is a personalised health programme where staying active, making healthier food choices, practising mindfulness, and sleeping better all count towards earning rewards in your quest for better health. 

Join Lu, an intergalactic explorer, on his adventures through Earth! Help him navigate different lands in a fun and rewarding journey towards better health. 

You can look forward to

PERSONALISED ACTIVITY CHALLENGES
Track your weekly activity goals and close Activity rings on your Apple Watch to earn LumiPoints. 

WELLNESS CHALLENGES
Take on holistic health challenges like improving your sleep habits, managing stress, and making healthier food choices that all contribute towards earning points too! 

JUST FOR YOU
Receive personalised recommendations and health tips – like health screening and vaccination reminders. You’ll also earn points through completing surveys, reading articles, and completing tailored challenges. 

REWARDS
Receive coins in return for the points that you’ve earned, and redeem them for HPB eVouchers that can be used at major lifestyle retailers, F&B outlets, and supermarkets. 

--
Level up your health. 
Download now.

This programme is available for residents in Singapore with a SingPass account, aged 17 years old or older. 
LumiHealth integrates with the Health app and uses HealthKit to help provide more personalised goals and challenges.
LumiHealth works best with Apple Watch Series 3 or later.

For more details, visit www.lumihealth.sg
data.releaseNotes: Introducing a new version to improve your LumiHealth journey. Let’s get moving to meet your weekly activity goals and earn some LumiPoints!

data.description: The hiSG+ mobile application is brought to you by the Health Promotion Board (HPB), exclusively for participants of the Health Insights Singapore (hiSG) study. The hiSG+ mobile app is designed to provide hiSG participants with a more seamless and engaging study experience by allowing them to respond directly to study questionnaires on the app and log their meals taken via the app’s meal logging tool. Participants are also able to track their progress in the study, earn Healthpoints for participation in study activities, as well as gain deeper insights on their health via the app.
data.releaseNotes: Enhancements to improve app performance and user experience

data.description:
This application is a service brought to you by the Health Promotion Board (HPB).

The National Steps Challenge (NSC) Kiosk application enables participants of the National Steps Challenge to sync their daily steps count and fitness data for the purpose of recording their Challenge progress. It also allows participants with limited or no access to the Healthy 365 mobile app such as non-smart phone users a platform to carry out their sync. Participants may also redeem their Healthpoints from a catalogue of rewards through this application. Please note that only participants who have already collected an existing HPB Fitness Tracker may sync their Fitness Trackers and join or participant in Health Challenges through this application. Participants will not be able to sync to the NSC Kiosk if they are not using a HPB Fitness Tracker. The NSC Kiosk application is for iPad download only and is strictly not for public distribution.

Key Features include:
•  Dashboard that provides you with an overview of your steps count, fitness, Healthpoints and rewards information
• Health Challenges that enable you to step up to get healthy, earn Healthpoints and redeem rewards
• History charts to keep records of your past steps count, heart rate and distance covered

Note:
• This app is only compatible with HPB issued Fitness Trackers and is not compatible with other brands of Fitness Trackers (eg: Fitbit, Garmin, etc)
•  For the optimum experience, please ensure the iPad is set to Singapore Time zone (GMT +8)
• For any enquiries, please call our hotline at 1800 567 2020 or email us at: stepschallenge@hpb.gov.sg
data.releaseNotes: - Minor bugfixes

data.description:
You can access our whole range of services and other features at your convenience.

* Check your sales application results, BTO flats available for selection and their probable completion dates

* View the recent transacted prices of resale flats and the ethnic quotas, at the location of your choice

The Housing & Development Board (HDB) is Singapore's public housing authority and a statutory board under the Ministry of National Development.

Note:

* This application is a service of the Singapore Government.
data.releaseNotes: Compatibility enhancements

data.description: A one-stop platform for the heartland shopper! Shoppers can get the latest information on product launches, promotions and events happening at HDB malls and shops.  Shoppers can also chat with HDB Retailers, shop and accumulate rewards points to redeem for exciting products, services and parking. Shop and Earn Rewards, Anytime, Anywhere.
data.releaseNotes: This update comes with minor app improvements to usability.

data.description:
Smart Parking System
 
The new parking system has no gantry barriers. When a vehicle enters the car park, the parking system detects and automatically activates the parking session through a parking app. Parking charges are collected backend and there is no need for motorists to manually activate the app, or remember to top up their cash cards when they exit. 
 
This new parking experience will benefit motorists in various ways:
 
-      No more barrier breakdown and jam in car park
-      No more having to remember to activate and stop parking app and to top up cash card.
-      No more having to press for paper receipt at gantry
 
This new generation parking system delivers a seamless parking experience for motorists. Motorists simply need to park and go! Do let us know if there are areas that can be improved at DigitalParking@hdb.gov.sg. Thank you!
data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for participating in the Parking@HDB trial! Here are the new features in this update:

- Export parking session history
- Display Shopperlink redemption of parking charges
- Show/hide password

We are always here to help! If you require support or simply want to provide feedback, you can get in touch with us at DigitalParking@hdb.gov.sg.

View your history of steps taken

data.description: DeliveryLink is a mobile app to book Loading and Unloading Bays (LUBs) at HDB designated shopping malls. It is designed for delivery companies and drivers to manage their bookings of LUBs. Retailers will also be notified on upcoming deliveries when LUB bookings are made by delivery companies and drivers.

data.description:
SGSecure is a national movement to sensitise, train and mobilise Singaporeans to play a part to prevent and deal with a terrorist attack.

Use the SGSecure app to: 
- Receive important broadcast messages from the authorities on the latest situation in the event of major emergencies
- Seek assistance from the authorities should a major situation happen in your vicinity
- Send videos, photos and messages to the authorities to provide information on a situation which you have witnessed
- Be alerted to any cardiac arrest or minor fire case in your vicinity
- Locate the nearest AED in your vicinity
- Be updated on security-related MFA Travel Advisories

Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can lead to decreased battery life of your mobile device.
data.releaseNotes:
- Enhancements to improve app stability



For Support, please contact:
- Telephone: 66849554 or Email: SGSecure_TechSupport@ncs.com.sg

data.description:
Volunteers are notified via the myResponder Mobile App by SCDF’s 995 Ops Centre of any Cardiac Arrest Case within 400 metres of their location. If you are notified, you may choose to respond to the incident and offer your assistance. The Mobile App will highlight nearby AEDs that may be available. 

Once you have located the victim suffering from cardiac arrest, you can assist the original caller who alerted SCDF in performing CPR or helping to apply the AED to revive the patient. SCDF’s 995 Ops Centre may also ask responders to guide the ambulance crew by escorting them to the incident site.

If you are 15 years and above and wish to volunteer, be sure to get your SingPass ID and password ready. If you are under 18 years old, please seek parental consent for your participation. Your handphone number is also required for SCDF to get in touch with you during an emergency. 

Your response is entirely voluntary, and we only encourage you to respond when you are available and to do so within safe and reasonable means.

myResponder is the latest project by the Singapore Civil Defence Force. The myResponder Mobile App alerts volunteers to nearby Cardiac Arrest Cases to render first aid before ambulance arrival. With myResponder, volunteers will have the following services at their fingertips:

- Geolocation notification of nearby cases
- Display of nearby incidents using OneMap
- Display of nearby AEDs using OneMap
- Geolocation enabled dialling of 995
- Access to the National AED Registry

Please note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

The Singapore Civil Defence Force – The Lifesaving Force
data.releaseNotes:
myResponder Version 3.9.5 is now live! Download the latest version to continue receiving case notifications. 



What's New : 
- Improved application accessibility

data.description:
ICA e-Services on-the-go:

This application is brought to you by the Immigration & Checkpoints Authority (ICA), a Singapore Government Agency.

MyICA Mobile App (1) provides a one-stop platform for Singapore residents and foreign visitors to transact with ICA conveniently. The features include:

•	SG Arrival Card (2) for residents and visitors to submit health declaration and arrival information
- Provide personal information with ease by scanning the passport biographical data page;
- Provide a group submission for up to 10 travellers; and
- Retrieve submitted records with ease.
•	Gateway to e-Services & MyICA portal
- Access existing ICA e-services and MyICA portal on your mobile phone.

Note: 
(1) The download and use of MyICA Mobile App is free of charge.
(2) The SG Arrival Card is NOT a visa. Visitors can visit Immigration & Checkpoints Authority (ICA) website to check if they need a visa to enter Singapore.

data.description:
This application is a service of the Singapore Government.
StayHome@SG is an initiative from the Immigration & Checkpoints Authority (ICA) which allows travelers that are served with Stay-Home Notice to register their Electronic Wristband and IoT gateway. The application supports the following features:
- Simple to follow PSHN registration via phone number/email with OTP verification.
- Simple to follow Wristband and Gateway registration via QR Code scanning.
- Application provides information such as phone number, wristband battery life, SHN end date and push notification from authority.
The use of the StayHome@SG is only for Personnel on Stay-Home Notice (PSHN). For more information, please visit our website at www.ica.gov.sg
data.releaseNotes: Bug Fixes.

data.description:
Police@SG is the initiative from the Singapore Police Force, which gives members of public access to useful information on the go. With Police@SG, everyone will have the following services at their fingertips:

- Read the latest crime news, police appeals for information and missing persons
- Locate the nearest police station from your current location
- Share content on Facebook and Twitter
- Links to Singapore Police Force homepage, recruitment and social media sites
- Submit information or respond to police appeals via our information submission portal "i-Witness"

The Singapore Police Force - A force for the Nation
data.releaseNotes: Bug Fix

data.description:
The App aids the 1-time secure setup to connect to Wireless@SGx network.

IMDA’s Wireless@SGx application caters to the needs of people who are constantly on the move.

IMDA’s revamp of the application features an improved user interface and new functions.

Through this app, you can:
  - Set up your device to automatically connect to the Wireless@SGx network
  - Locate Wireless@SG hotspots via an interactive map
  - Run speed tests and diagnostics that can help improve network experience
  - Receive important updates for Wireless@SG

To prevent potential conflict, please UNINSTALL the older version of Wireless@SGx application and delete all previous Wireless@SGx profiles.

Data charges may be incurred if using this application on a paid connection such as mobile data.
data.releaseNotes:
- User Interface Accessibility Enhancements
- Bug Fixes

data.description: "Report-A-Fault" is a mobile application that provides a convenient channel for reporting issues (e.g. Cleanliness, Defects, etc.) of properties under JTC. data.description:
The JTC Survey Fee Calculator application is developed by JTC Corporation to provide users an estimate of the survey fees payable for a range of survey works required. These survey works include:

 - Lease Allocation Survey
 - Temporary Occupation License (TOL) Survey
 - Subdivision Survey
 - Amalgamation Survey

Besides calculating the total survey fee, the application will present a breakdown of the components as follows:

 - JTC Survey Fee
 - URA Processing Fee (where applicable)
 - SLA Survey Fee (where applicable)
 - Goods and Services Tax (GST)

About JTC Corporation
JTC Corporation (JTC) is Singapore’s leading industrial infrastructure specialist spearheading the planning, promotion and development of a dynamic industrial landscape.  

For more than 40 years, JTC has played a key role in the growth of the economy by providing cutting-edge industrial real estate solutions. Some of its landmark projects include wafer fabrication parks, business parks, Biopolis and Fusionopolis at one-north, a chemicals hub on Jurong Island, biomedical parks as well as logistics hubs for various industries. These industrial and business parks are now home to renowned global companies and promising local enterprises.   

Today, JTC continues to break new ground with pioneering projects that anticipate and address the future needs of industry. The Jurong Rock Caverns look to subterranean depths to optimise land use; Seletar Aerospace Park and Tukang Innovation Park support the growth of new industry clusters in aerospace and innovation activities; CleanTech Park, Singapore's first eco-business park, offers unique clean technology features and also serves as a 'living lab' for the test-bedding and development of green technologies and sustainable urban solutions; and the Jurong Island Version 2.0 initiative plans to cut carbon emissions and enhance competitiveness of the chemicals hub.

As Singapore transforms itself for the future, JTC will partner with its customers to understand their evolving needs and develop appropriate 'future-ready' infrastructure solutions. The Corporation will continue to expand its innovation capacity and offer infrastructure facilities of a calibre that sets the city state apart as an investment location. JTC will hence position itself as an industrial infrastructure innovator that creates value for its customers by developing the optimal infrastructure solutions that they aspire. This will help differentiate Singapore and propel it to the next level of growth.

For more information on JTC and its products and services, please visit www.jtc.gov.sg.
data.releaseNotes: In this new version, users can report vulnerability.

data.agencyFullName: MARITIME AND PORT AUTHORITY OF SINGAPORE
data.developerName: Maritime and Port Authority of Singapore
data.description:
This application is a service of the Singapore Government. 

To give the public and maritime users time to adjust to the new user interface before the existing app is discontinued, this release of myMaritime@SG will be launched as a new app.

Get access to the news releases, latest vessel information/alerts and other e-services with myMaritime@SG:
• News releases and circulars
• Real time information of a vessel details
• Latest vessel arrival/departure schedule
• Daily shipping state list of vessels
• Receive alert when a vessel arrives, departs, or moves from one location to another within Singapore Port
• Report unusual or illegal activities in port waters via Feedback
• Tidal Atlas
• And many more e-services to come in future updates...

Note: The m-Marinet module requires users to have a valid MARINET login ID to access. For more information on MARINET, please visit http://www.mpa.gov.sg/sites/global_navigation/e-services/e_services.page.

The Maritime and Port Authority of Singapore (MPA) was established on 2 February 1996, with the mission to develop Singapore as a premier global hub port and International Maritime Centre (IMC), and to advance and safeguard Singapore's strategic maritime interests. MPA is the driving force behind Singapore's port and maritime development, taking on the roles of Port Authority, Port Regulator, Port Planner, IMC Champion, and National Maritime Representative. MPA partners the industry and other agencies to enhance safety, security and environmental protection in Singapore port waters, facilitate port operations and growth, expand the cluster of maritime ancillary services, and promote maritime R&D and manpower development.
data.releaseNotes: UI enhancement

data.developerName: Maritime and Port Authority of Singapore
data.description:
This is a mobile application for employees of the Maritime and Port Authority of Singapore.

myMPA seeks to make staff services and information readily accessible at your fingertips. Apply for leave, submit claims, find other colleagues and follow MPA's social media accounts on the move!

Have new ideas? Contact the team to share.
data.releaseNotes:
New features:
- Decommissioning of existing Leave & Claims functions under myServices on 14 May and 20 Jun respectively

data.description:
The myENV App is a one-stop platform in Singapore for environmental, water and food information at your fingertips. 
 
It provides a comprehensive suite of information and services from the Ministry of Sustainability and the Environment (MSE) which covers weather, air quality, dengue hot spots, water level, flood, water disruption, hawker centre, food hygiene, and recycling.  Users can also report feedback to MSE and its agencies through this app.
 
•    Access real-time information on Singapore’s weather and receive push-notification alerts when heavy rain occurs
 
•     View latest PSI & hourly PM2.5 information
 
•     Locate dengue clusters
 
•     Search for hawker centre

•     View the food alerts and recall related information

•    Obtain useful food hygiene related information such as Food Establishment Hygiene
     Grades and list of licensed food caterers

•    Get alerted on environmental situations such as earthquake, drain water level, flash           floods, lightning and haze

•     View the water supply disruption information

•     Convenience of providing feedback to NEA, PUB and SFA

•     Save locations and personalise the relevant information you wish to see for each                 location

myENV app will need access to certain features on your phone for the following reasons:

Calendar
This allows myENV to provide you more accurate information events, alerting you on weather and environmental conditions before your event 

Location
Allowing myENV to use location will allow the app to serve you location-specific information (e.g weather, dengue)

Location When In Use
Allowing myENV to use location will allow the app to serve you location-specific information (e.g weather, dengue)

Location Always and When In Use
This allows myENV to use your location to understand your location patterns, so we can provide you more accurate suggestions based on your locations

Photos/Media/Files
Allow you to save photographs taken with myENV app in your phone and to attach them when you file a report to NEA/PUB/SFA

Camera
Access the phone's camera if you wish to attach a photograph while making a Report to NEA/PUB/SFA

Microphone
Required to record videos
data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for your feedback! We reviewed every feedback received to make the app better for you. 

Changes in this version includes:
 • New temperature and rainfall distribution map
 • Viewing lightning and rain movement on the map concurrently

If you like the app, please rate us in the [Play Store/App Store]. It would serve as great motivation to us. For any feedback, please share with us through the in-app feedback form available under Settings -> ‘Help us improve’. Thank you.

data.description:
Parents Gateway is an initiative by MOE to enable parents with Singpass  to interact with schools more conveniently on administrative matters. Parents will also be able to use this app to stay updated on school’s programme and activities. 

The mobile app is currently only available for mainstream MOE Kindergartens, Primary schools, Secondary schools and Junior Colleges/Centralised Institute.

We appreciate if you can share with us your feedback to help MOE enhance and improve the experience, benefiting more parents in future.

[Note]
- If you choose to log out of Parents Gateway, you will stop receiving notifications for new announcements and consent forms until your next log-in.

- The Parents Gateway app uses Singpass to identify parents of students in MOE schools. Singpass is only used to identify and authenticate the parent. The Singpass ID and the password will not be stored in the app. Upon successful authentication, the connection to Singpass will be terminated and the login will henceforth be managed by the Parents Gateway app. There is no risk of Singpass credentials being stolen if a user stays logged in.
data.releaseNotes: - Bug fixes

data.description:
“Connecting and empowering learners – learning on the go anytime, anywhere!” 

OPAL2.0 is a Ministry of Education (MOE) digital learning platform for staff that advances the philosophy of PD Ownership and Leadership. It is designed primarily for personalised and collaborative learning, to nurture the 21st Century digital learner.
With the latest OPAL2.0 enhancements, learners can look forward to the selection of widgets on their Personal Interactive Dashboard. Learners can be updated with recommended courses and digital content through the Integrated Newsfeed. They can also create and view their own learning events and keep abreast of the events of communities they belong to via their Personal Calendar.
data.releaseNotes: Thank you for using OPAL2.0! We’ve enhanced the performance of the app for a more pleasant experience.

data.description:
SGWorkPass is a free mobile app to check the validity of Singapore work passes. 
 
A must have app for all employers, foreign employees, agents, or anyone who wishes to verify if a work pass card issued by the Singapore Ministry of Manpower (MOM) is valid.

Scan it to check it
A work pass could be cancelled before it expires as employment status can change over time. When this happens, the pass holder is not allowed to continue working in Singapore.  Simply launch the SGWorkPass app to scan the QR code of a work pass card and you can verify its validity instantly.

To support the needs of pass holders, the app will be continuously improved with new features and useful information to support their working and living in Singapore.  More details can be found at: https://www.mom.gov.sg/eservices/sgworkpass
data.releaseNotes: bug fixes and performance enhancements

data.description:
The FWMOMCare application released on 18 May 2020, is developed by the Ministry of Manpower (MOM) to primarily monitor foreign workers' health status. This information will help MOM better manage and plan the deployment efforts of officers and medical teams. FWMOMCare also serves to link up foreign workers who are unwell with the 24/7 telemedicine service to seek prompt medical consultation. 

The application will undergo continuous improvements to better meet the demands of our  foreign workers. New features and information that foreign workers find useful will be rolled out in phases. This includes dissemination of MOM’s latest advisories and engagement events
data.releaseNotes:
1. Enhancement in Helpline
2. Bug fixes

data.description: DormWatch is a mobile app which allows users (such as foreign workers), to report on defects, broken facilities/ equipment directly to the dormitory operator. The app aims to encourage operators to self-regulate and fix the issues identified by users. It also tracks, monitors and alerts parties of that latest status updates. MOM will also be kept informed on the progress of the issues identified; MOM would be able to step in and inspect the premises if deemed necessary.
data.releaseNotes: Bug fixes.

data.description:
The OneService App is a convenient platform that allows you to make improvements to your neighbourhood, access information, receive alerts, and engage one another- anytime, anywhere.

- Improve your neighbourhood by submitting feedback
Fix issues like cleanliness, pests and maintenance of greenery and infrastructure by using this App.  We will help to direct your feedback to the relevant Town Council or authorities such as HDB, NEA, LTA and NParks. There is no need for you to indicate which agency is responsible!

- Be informed of happenings in your neighbourhood
Receive dengue and air quality alerts. Be informed of renovation works and lift faults in your block.

- Make a difference in your neighbourhood
Refer persons in need to social service agencies via the Help Neighbour feature. Participate in surveys via ‘What Say You?’ to provide your views on your living environment.

- Enjoy facilities in your neighbourhood
Book facilities such as void decks and multi-purpose halls for weddings and funerals. 
Find parking in nearby carparks, pay for parking at coupon-based car parks.

Download the OneService App! Login with your Singpass, Facebook, Google or Apple account to start improving your neighbourhood today!

KEY APP FEATURES 
Report municipal issues in your neighbourhood such as:
- Facilities maintenance in HDB estates
- Illegal parking
- Cleanliness
- Roads & Footpaths
- Animals & Birds
- Pests 
- And more!!

Other OneService App features include:
- Receive notifications on happenings in the neighbourhood, including HDB renovation and lift faults
- Receive weather, air quality and dengue updates
- Refer persons in need to social safety agencies 
- Book facilities 
- Participate in surveys to improve your neighbourhood
- Find parking in nearby carparks
- Pay for parking at coupon-based carparks


ABOUT ONESERVICE
This application is a Smart Nation Initiative developed by the Municipal Services Office. Municipal Services Office partners 17 Town Councils and 10 government agencies:
- Building and Construction Authority (BCA)
- Housing and Development Board (HDB)
- Land Transport Authority (LTA)
- National Environment Agency (NEA)
- National Parks Board (NParks)
- People’s Association (PA)
- PUB, the National Water Agency
- Singapore Land Authority (SLA)
- Singapore Police Force (SPF)
- Urban Redevelopment Authority (URA) 


FEEDBACK
For feedback on the One Service App, you can submit it as a case via the app. 
If you are unable to access the OneService App, please email mso_appenquiry@mnd.gov.sg

TERMS OF USE AND PRIVACY 
By downloading, you agree to the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy of the OneService App.
URL for Terms of Use:
https://www.oneservice.gov.sg/terms
URL for Privacy Policy:
https://www.oneservice.gov.sg/privacy

data.description:
Curated by the National Archives of Singapore, the application leads visitors through the historic
Former Ford Factory’s permanent World War Two exhibition via an interactive guide.
The Former Ford Factory was the place where the British forces in Singapore surrendered to the
Imperial Japanese Army on 15 February 1942.
The application supplements the exhibition and enhances the overall user experience through oral
history accounts, archival material, exclusive video content via QR code scanning and Augmented
Reality (AR) features.
Check out the exhibition at: www.nas.gov.sg/formerfordfactory

data.description: The New NPalm Nursing Assessment app is the first-of-its-kind mobile nursing assessment programme in Asia. Updated to HTML 5 with auto synchronize to backend database. The app allows NP students to conduct MCQ-type self assessment, update learning journals and also allows Clinical Facilitators (CF) and Clinical Instructors (CI) to securely record/sign skill items performed during the clinical attachments. Lecturers are also able to view records created by students under their charge. The individual sub-apps are: 1. Pre-test 2. E-LogBook and 3. Learning Journal.
data.releaseNotes: Update to increase the maximum number of characters for the Logbook description.

data.description:
This app is an educational tool that acts as both a reference and a self-assessment tool for skeletal bones and joint movements.

The app consists of 5 different bone sets:
• cranial bones 
• upper limb
• lower limb
• facial
• axial skeleton

Users can:
• browse the reference section to learn about the bone groups
• try assembling each bone group from constituent bones, then name them
• test themselves on correct joint movements using the accelerometer (e.g. abduction at left shoulder)

Points are awarded for correctly joining the bones to form a bone group as well as correct movement of the joint.

This app is developed for the School of Health Sciences, Ngee Ann Polytechnic. For more information, please contact sch_hs@np.edu.sg.
data.releaseNotes:
This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

Upgraded to 3D model of the Skeleton and also to support the latest iOS and all the iPhone screen sizes.

data.description: Given the list of medical abbreviations widely used in the healthcare context, this apps allows nursing students to seek answers to those mind-boggling abbreviations scribbled in medical documents. These medical abbreviations are arranged in alphabetical order allowing user to search for the abbreviations and its definitions quickly.
data.releaseNotes: Minor bug fix

data.description: Singapore is a multiracial country with a population made up of Chinese, Malays, Indians and  other races.  To bridge this communication gap between the races and dialects used by the population at large and the nursing students, a database with audio capability of commonly-used phrases by nurses, are made available in Mandarin, the Hokkien and Cantonese dialects as well as Malay.
data.releaseNotes: Minor bug fix

data.description: The app has 2 sections; Coronary Circulation and Electrocardiogram. Each section is developed into 3 levels of learning processes. The contents of the levels are designed with Bloom Taxonomy from the basic anatomy & physiology to the mechanism of disease processes and the diagnosis & management of cardiovascular diseases.
data.releaseNotes:
- Enhanced AR experience.
- Minor bug fixes.

data.description:
The IPCP app provides you with the opportunity to learn interprofessional skills, knowledge and attitudes in a fun, interactive and immersive environment. To become an effective healthcare practitioner in a complex working environment, the ability to collaborate, communicate and problem solve with other interprofessional members is essential.

The IPCP app has been developed collboratively with educators and interprofessional team members to provide an authentic insight to working in a healthcare setting.

The app is divided to 4 units of varying difficulty from basic (Introduction of IP Team Members) to intermediate (Drug Confusion and Patient Care) to advanced (Patient Discharge) levels of interprofessional competencies.
data.releaseNotes: - Minor UI bug fixed for iPhone 13

data.description: Single-Player, 2 Level,  Virtual Hospital Game designed for nursing students and nurses to simulate a real hospital environment. This game is designed around 12 major diseases which allows the player to apply critical thinking skills in an interactive game.
data.releaseNotes:
- Content updates and enhancement.
- Minor bug fixes.

data.description:
Learning endocrine system is very complex and confusing as students need to remember total number of 14 endocrine structures, more than 30 hormones and their different actions on various target organs in the body. Students need more practice to be familiar with terminology, to have better retention to remember the names and actions of different endocrine glands and respective hormones etc.  Endocrine Game is specially designed to help students learn about the complex human endocrine system through play on their mobile iOS devices. Players can test their knowledge of different endocrine glands and hormones secreted in the body system. They simply choose correct endocrine organ/s or hormone secreted level by level (e.g., head level, neck level, chest level, abdomen level and gonads) from the given list of answer keys. They can do numerous attempts to improve their score. 
Enhance your learning experience… try and test yourself as you learn the endocrine system, using this innovative, interactive way on the go anytime anywhere !
data.releaseNotes: This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

data.description:
This mobile game is designed to enhance learning in human anatomy and physiology for the medical and health sciences students. Even for the learners without prior biological background, you can play this anatomy game easily and learn the different types of cranial nerves. A highly interactive set-up, the roulette wheel, engages the users effectively to complete the learning journey for the whole set of cranial nerves.  
Being the only 12 pairs of nerves in the body which attach directly the brain, you might wonder how these nerves are special. This game strengthens your knowledge in the following aspects. 
1)	Identifying the cranial nerves with the names & the assigned numbers. 
2)	Classification according to their nature & function such as pure motor, pure sensory, special sensory, mixed nerve etc. 
3)	Names & functions of the cranial nerves for special sensory.
4)	Names & functions of the cranial nerves for pure sensory. 
5)	Names & functions of the cranial nerves for pure motor. 
6)	Names & functions of the mixed cranial nerves.
7)	Identifying the cranial nerve which functions in autonomic nervous system. 
A comprehensive reference section and systematic feedback from the app enable the learners to achieve the desired learning goal conveniently. In fact, this game is your pocket learning resource or your practice companion to tackle the complexity of the nervous system of the human anatomy.
data.releaseNotes: This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

data.description:
Developed by the SingHealth Group, Health Buddy gives you access to health information and services, anytime, anywhere. Through this app, SingHealth hopes to encourage active involvement in one’s own health and well-being. 
Features: 
* Mobile Appointments Manage all your or appointments.
Clinic Queue Updates 
Get your queue number and monitor queue status from your phone.
* Mobile Pay Leave the clinic after seeing the doctor and receive SMS to pay at the end of the day.
* Medicine Top-Up
Arrange to pick up your medicine or request for a repeat prescription.
* Conditions & Treatments Access over 800 conditions and treatments written by our SingHealth doctors.
* SingHealth Doctors Access over 1,000 internationally qualified SingHealth doctors for your treatment needs.
* Hospitals & Specialty Centres
Find contact information, directions, visit guides and more!
* Health Tips by HealthXchange.sg Stay healthy with useful and trusted health tips from our doctors.
* Health Videos Browse library of videos as seen in our clinic waiting areas.
* Find a GP  Find contact information and opening hours of GP / Family Doctors in Singapore.
* Caregiver [NEW!] Get authorised to conveniently help manage your loved ones’ medical matters.
* Personal Profile View and update your contact information.
* My Visit [NEW!] for selected SGH DMC patients. Read consultation summary, answer health questionnaires on-the-go.
* Pre- and Post-Consultation Health Questionnaires
1. Complete clinic health questionnaires before your visit or after your consultation, from the comfort of your home!
* Medicine Information and Reminders
View medicine information and set reminders to take your medicine. 

IMPORTANT:

data.description:
This is an interactive ECG teaching app designed by cardiologists to help teach the clinical pearls of ECG interpretation to doctors, healthcare professionals and students.

This app includes many case-based examples, quizzes and tips and tricks that will help in the learning process.

This app has been endorsed by several major cardiology societies.
data.releaseNotes: Updated toolbar view compatibility for 6.5" displays

data.description:
Formerly known as 'Whatsupdoc', this app was initiated in 2017 and developed by residents for residents in collaboration with SingHealth Residency's CRAFT EduTech with funding  from the SingHealth Duke-NUS Obstetrics and Gynaecology (OBGYN) ACP Education Grant.

Whatsupdoc was developed to provide quick and convenient clinical information for junior doctors at work. The current content is OBGYN-based, but through the adoption of a modern mobile architectures has the potential to be scalable and adapted for usage by other specialties.

The concept of Whatsupdoc and its development process was published in The Asia-Pacific Scholar, and presented internationally at AMEE Basel, Switzerland in 2018 and at FIGO in Brazil 2018.

Over time, Whatsupdoc naturally progressed to 'AM Buddy' with the aim of improving access to evidence-based clinical guidance relevant to our SingHealth Academic Medicine (AM) community, starting with OBGYN as the Minimal Viable Product (MVP).

AM Buddy is co-funded and developed collaboratively by the SingHealth Duke-NUS OBGYN ACP and SingHealth Research & Education (R&E) CIO Office.

OneMap is the authoritative national map of Singapore with the most detailed and timely updated information developed by the Singapore Land Authority. There are also many useful day-to-day information and services contributed by government agencies.
 
Features of OneMap:

SEARCH: Search for addresses with postal codes and building names.

NAVIGATION: Get driving and public transport directions with walking routes.

FIND NEARBY INFORMATION: Locate nearby amenities and government information.

MAP STYLES: Select from a range of base maps.

FREE TO USE: All maps and features are free to use. No in-app purchases.
 
If you have any questions or feedback, please drop us an email at onemap@sla.gov.sg

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OneMap

The SiReNT mobile app is a companion app for users of the Singapore Satellite Positioning Reference Network (SiReNT) services. data.description:
SP Mobile is a Singapore Polytechnic (SP) mobile application. Established in 1954, SP is Singapore's first polytechnic. SP offers full-time diploma courses and a wide range of continuing education programmes to its students. SP alumni includes successful entrepreneurs, well-known professionals, and leaders in government.

SP Mobile provides a single point access to commonly used tools for students and staff in SP to learn and work. Some features (e.g. Campus Map) are also available to public. The app can be personalised by customising favourite apps list on the home page to easily access the frequently used features.

Tip: It is recommended to enable push notifications from SP Mobile. You will receive useful alerts, such as Library, SAS, and important notifications from SP.

Note: SP Mobile is supported in the two latest iOS versions. Upgrade to the latest iOS version in order to enjoy the full features on SP Mobile.

Users will be alerted when nearing their destination in Live View. The app also provides a new, easy-to-use search interface for places of interest.

Note: SP AR Map works on iPhone 8 (or newer) devices. This app is not optimised for iPad devices.

data.description:
Life.
It’s not about looking perfect, eating perfect, or being perfect.

It’s simply a journey about trying - taking little steps to form small habits in our daily lives that can make a big impact.

With Active Health Labs being rolled out island-wide managed by qualified Active Health Experts, an Active Health app to keep track of your fitness progress, and fun community activities, it’s never been easier to proactively own your health.

Besides allowing you to take some assessment tests, this app will also import activity data from HealthKit/Health App. By putting together data from various domains, my Active Health app provides an overview of your health status, aiding you in this Active Health Journey. 

Let’s all live life to the fullest.

And remember, #betterbeatsperfect

data.description:
RP Connect is Republic Polytechnic’s official mobile application. 

It is a one-stop platform that provides personalized services and information to RP students and staff on the go.
data.releaseNotes: Thank you for using RP Connect! This release includes The RP Quest, a new game created to commemorate RP's 20th Anniversary.

data.description: SNApp will get you all the information you need for your time in RP. SNApp will help you find the CCA you are looking for, arrange an appointment with your mentor and update you on the latest news and events happening on and off campus. You get to stay connected with your friends and lecturers and be equipped with all that is happening in RP. A memorable and meaningful journey at RP will be a SNApp.
data.releaseNotes: Minor bug fixes and improvements

data.description: LEO2.0 Mobile is a complementary application to Republic Polytechnic’s LEO2.0 Learning Management System. LEO2.0 Mobile is designed to offer new experiences in your learning journey in RP. The platform empowers you to learn-on-the-go, anytime, anywhere.
data.releaseNotes: Bug Fixes

data.description: The Official Application for The SOH brought to you by Republic Polytechnic
data.releaseNotes: Performance Enhancements

data.description:
Introducing the app that will welcome you to a world of wonder at Our Tampines Hub.

Get the full details and listing of all the retail, food & beverage outlets at the Hub – keep up with the latest on all events, programmes and activities hosted within the Hub and receive real-time updates  on current and upcoming events, career opportunities and customer rewards programmes. Check out the photo gallery to better visualise the different features at OTH and use the app to help you get from where you are, to where you want to go in the Hub, in the quickest and easiest way.

Download OTH Mobile to make the most of your OTH experience – unlock rewards and other perks with our customer loyalty programme which will also feature Exclusive access to promotions and events, amongst other exciting programmes that will help you unlock a plethora of privileges that can be enjoyed at Our Tampines Hub.
data.releaseNotes: Minor bug fixed.

data.description:
MyPAssion is an application of the People's Association.

PAssion Card members can view the latest PAssion merchants, deals and privileges via the application. With MyPAssion, members can login via Singpass to download their PAssion e-Card(s) to enjoy greater convenience at PAssion Merchants that accept the PAssion e-Card as a form of identity.

Be informed of the latest PAssion promotions near you, and easily find their locations.
 
More updates are coming your way! Be sure to update your app regularly.
data.releaseNotes: Enhanced performance and bug fixes

data.description:
PALMS is a one-stop mobile learning management platform for grassroots volunteers of the People's Association.  The app allows you to access interactive e-Learning courseware with your mobile devices at your convenience.
 
Features include: 
-          Interactive learning contents
-          e-Certificate upon completion
-          Learning progress
-          Online resources
-          Learning Compass navigation page [new!]
 
NACLI will continue to introduce new features and new e-contents to upskill and enable you to better serve the community.
 
Download PALMS today!
data.releaseNotes:
Thank you for using PALMS! We are working hard to improve the app to enable our grassroots volunteers to have a more enjoyable learning experience. This version includes a number of user-interface improvements and several bug fixes.

Update your PALMS app now to experience the new enhancements. If you are still experiencing instability, please bear with us while we work towards improving the app!

data.description:
BALIKSG LITE is an augmented reality experience presented by the National Heritage Board. It allows users to witness historic moments like the signing of the 1819 treaty at the Padang and expresses the stories of Singapore in wherever you are.
Please allow camera permission in order to use the augmented reality feature. To enjoy the augmented reality experience better, we encourage you to find an open space with a flat surface (ie. floor or table top) and explore this indoors or outdoors at any time.
NOTES:
The content in this mobile app presents information on the history of Singapore through a creative interpretation of past events. While extensive research has been done to depict historical events and persons of interest as accurately as possible, certain characters in the app are fictitious. Any similarity to actual persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental.

Rediscover Singapore through a single app! Whether you’re looking for great bites, serene parks, cool bars, or activities for the whole family, the Visit Singapore Travel Guide makes your passions possible.

We have put together great promotions for you to eat, shop, play, stay your way around the island. Take advantage of the deals for attractions, hotels, tours and more. Your exploration is limited only by your imagination.

What’s more, venture into the nooks and crannies of our districts using our Precinct Guides and Local Recommendations. Whether you are revisiting old hangouts or finding new favourites, each precinct presents its own unique flavours and character for endless discovery.

Hungry, but can’t decide on what to eat? We give you a lunch place recommendation. No more browsing eatery after eatery. Furthermore, use our features such as experiential routing and itinerary planner for serendipitous discovery, and save places of interest in your Favourites list for easy access on the go.
data.releaseNotes: Mark your calendars: the Singapore HeritageFest is returning for its 19th edition! From 2nd to 29th May, join Merli once again for a new adventure in Chinatown, Little India, Kampong Gelam and Katong-Joo Chiat in our special edition of Merli-Go-Round to Singapore HeritageFest. Go on a hunt and earn in-game coins for exclusive Merli merchandise as you discover hidden gems and enjoy experiences and offerings across retail, dining, tours and attractions. You can access our app for more event details!

data.description: This is the Official Mobile App is for the Singapore Members of Parliament. This Mobile App will contains relevant materials and documents for the Parliament Sitting. MP can refer to the pre-sitting documents directly from the app at their own convenience. The Application will also send out any official notifications pertaining to the Sitting.
data.releaseNotes:
We’re continuously making improvements to make our app better for you, so we release updates regularly.

Every update of our app could include improvements for speed and reliability.

data.description:
The NParks Explore A Route (NEAR) mobile app is NParks’ first augmented reality (AR)-enabled mobile application. It was developed to complement the Coast-to-Coast Trail (C2C), as well as the Route Island Route (RIR) and Park Connector Network (PCN) for an interactive curated walking experience island-wide. 

Get active while creating trails of your own with our self-mapping feature "Phyll My Trail", or share your experiences with the NEAR community, be it gorgeous sightings or interesting info on places to check out along the way!

Look out for hidden fruits using our AR mode and watch as Phyll the Leaf and friends spring to life, sharing nuggets of information about the flora and fauna found around the various checkpoints along the C2C.

Also, check out your notifications for periodic fun and rewarding challenges as well as special promotions!
data.releaseNotes: - speed dialog patch

data.description:
This application is a service of the Singapore Government.

See an interesting animal or plant? Share it with us through this SGBioAtlas app! SGBioAtlas is a citizen-science platform for nature lovers to share their biodiversity sightings and uses crowd-sourced information to map the distribution of flora and fauna across Singapore. It is not only simple to use, it is also a fun way to learn more about the amazing diversity of animals and plants in our City in a Garden. Every sighting you record will contribute to our database of precious local biodiversity. Refer to http://biome.nparks.gov.sg for more info.

This app is brought to you by the National Parks Board (NParks) as part of the Community in Nature (CIN) initiative. As the lead agency on nature conservation, NParks has developed an urban biodiversity conservation model, which aims to conserve representative eco-systems in land-scarce Singapore.  NParks also monitors and coordinates measures to enhance the presence of biodiversity in our urban landscape. 

Date released: 16 April 2015

For technical issues, please e-mail biome_support@ncodeconsultant.com

For general queries, please e-mail CIN@nparks.gov.sg.
data.releaseNotes:
- Fixes for bugs that does not allow registration of new account.
- Implementation for WOGAA.
